name: Linen Loose Cover for Radcliffe 2-Seater Sofa – Dyed Oyster
description: Choose a loose cover for the minimalist Radcliffe 2-Seater Sofa. Its clean lines, gently flared arms and tapered legs bring instant style that you can dress as you please. Our Dyed Oyster Stonewashed Linen brings neutral tones to the material, which, as the name suggests, is tumbled with stones for a textured finish. You can order up to five free samples of our fabrics.
